data.lyric:
[ti:Remind Me to Forget]
[ar:Kygo/Miguel]
[al:Remind Me to Forget]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Remind Me to Forget - Kygo (凯戈)/Miguel
[00:01.87]Written by：Alex Oriet/David Phelan/Phil Plested
[00:03.75]It never fades away it's staying
[00:08.47]Your kiss like broken glass on my skin
[00:12.77]
[00:13.34]And all the greatest loves end in violence
[00:17.71]
[00:18.21]It's tearing up my voice left in silence
[00:22.47]
[00:23.00]Baby it hit so hard holding on to my chest
[00:27.55]
[00:28.17]Maybe you left your mark reminding me to forget
[00:32.26]
[00:32.84]It doesn't matter where you are you can keep my regret
[00:37.57]'Cause baby I got these scars reminding me to forget
[00:42.45]Reminding me I got these scars get your love
[00:47.34]
[00:48.10]Keep reminding me ooh to forget your love
[00:51.64]
[00:52.88]You left your mark my heart
[00:56.36]
[00:57.65]You left your mark reminding me to forget
[01:01.32]
[01:02.54]You left your mark my heart
[01:06.16]
[01:07.30]You left your mark understand
[01:11.11]
[01:12.33]You left your mark my heart
[01:15.85]
[01:17.07]You left your mark reminding me to forget
[01:20.70]
[01:21.91]You left your mark my heart
[01:25.62]
[01:26.88]You left your mark understand
[01:30.53]
[01:33.78]There's no room in war for feelings
[01:37.65]
[01:38.27]Hurt me to the core still healing
[01:42.44]
[01:42.94]And I know you're no good for me
[01:47.96]So I try to forget the memories
[01:52.22]
[01:52.74]Baby it hit so hard holding on to my chest
[01:57.14]
[01:57.85]Maybe you left your mark reminding me to forget
[02:02.00]
[02:02.60]It doesn't matter where you are you can keep my regret
[02:07.32]Baby I got these scars reminding me to forget
[02:11.62]
[02:12.96]You left your mark my heart
[02:16.40]
[02:17.70]You left your mark reminding me to forget
[02:21.29]
[02:22.28]You left your mark my heart
[02:26.30]
[02:27.39]You left your mark understand
[02:31.17]
[02:33.52]Remember I told you
[02:35.30]
[02:35.92]To save it it's over
[02:37.79]
[02:38.97]And I'll be alright
[02:40.39]
[02:41.41]So hurt me as much as you like
[02:43.14]I need you to let go
[02:45.71]I got these mementos
[02:47.59]
[02:48.76]And I'll be alright
[02:50.54]
[02:53.63]Baby it hit so hard holding on to my chest
[02:57.82]
[02:58.41]Maybe you left your mark reminding me to forget
[03:03.01]It doesn't matter where you are you can keep my regret
[03:07.94]Baby I got these scars reminding me to forget
[03:12.41]
[03:13.60]You left your mark my heart
[03:17.43]
[03:18.25]You left your mark reminding me to forget
[03:21.99]
[03:23.16]You left your mark my heart
[03:26.76]
[03:27.98]You left your mark reminding me to forget
data.trans:
[ti:Remind Me to Forget]
[ar:Kygo/Miguel]
[al:Remind Me to Forget]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.87]//
[00:03.75]它从未远离 它一直都在
[00:08.47]你的吻细细密密 就像我肌肤上的碎玻璃
[00:12.77]
[00:13.34]伟大的爱情都是以暴力结尾
[00:17.71]
[00:18.21]我的嗓音渐渐撕裂 最终只剩沉默
[00:22.47]
[00:23.00]宝贝 太过痛苦 拥抱我吧
[00:27.55]
[00:28.17]可能你留下了印记 提醒我将过去遗忘
[00:32.26]
[00:32.84]无论你身处何方 我对你一直怀有歉意
[00:37.57]宝贝 我这满身伤疤就是在提醒我遗忘
[00:42.45]提醒我 你的爱给了我这些伤疤
[00:47.34]
[00:48.10]它们时刻提醒我 忘记你的爱
[00:51.64]
[00:52.88]你将印记 留在我的心上
[00:56.36]
[00:57.65]你留下印记 提醒我遗忘
[01:01.32]
[01:02.54]你将印记 留在我的心上
[01:06.16]
[01:07.30]你留下印记 我明白
[01:11.11]
[01:12.33]你将印记 留在我的心上
[01:15.85]
[01:17.07]你留下印记 提醒我遗忘
[01:20.70]
[01:21.91]你将印记 留在我的心上
[01:25.62]
[01:26.88]你留下印记 我明白
[01:30.53]
[01:33.78]硝烟四起 根本无法细心感受
[01:37.65]
[01:38.27]你让我元气大伤 我只能等待愈合
[01:42.44]
[01:42.94]我知道你对我已毫无情意
[01:47.96]所以我只能努力将过去忘掉
[01:52.22]
[01:52.74]宝贝 太过痛苦 拥抱我吧
[01:57.14]
[01:57.85]可能你留下了印记 提醒我将过去遗忘
[02:02.00]
[02:02.60]无论你身处何方 我对你一直怀有歉意
[02:07.32]宝贝 我这满身伤疤就是在提醒我遗忘
[02:11.62]
[02:12.96]你将印记 留在我的心上
[02:16.40]
[02:17.70]你留下印记 提醒我遗忘
[02:21.29]
[02:22.28]你将印记 留在我的心上
[02:26.30]
[02:27.39]你留下印记 我明白
[02:31.17]
[02:33.52]记得我跟你讲过的吗
[02:35.30]
[02:35.92]为了保持更久 结果现在就结束了
[02:37.79]
[02:38.97]我会好的
[02:40.39]
[02:41.41]你可以尽情伤害我
[02:43.14]这样我才能放手
[02:45.71]我得到了纪念品
[02:47.59]
[02:48.76]我会好的
[02:50.54]
[02:53.63]宝贝 太过痛苦 拥抱我吧
[02:57.82]
[02:58.41]可能你留下了印记 提醒我将过去遗忘
[03:03.01]无论你身处何方 我对你一直怀有歉意
[03:07.94]宝贝 我这满身伤疤就是在提醒我遗忘
[03:12.41]
[03:13.60]你将印记 留在我的心上
[03:17.43]
[03:18.25]你留下印记 提醒我遗忘

[03:23.16]你将印记 留在我的心上

[03:27.98]你留下印记 提醒我遗忘
